required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Monocentric Retrospective Observational Study on Patients With Macular Degeneration
clinical_study.official_title: Monocentric Retrospective Observational Study Describing the Visual Acuity of Patients With Exudative Age Related Macular Degeneration and Treated by Lucentis® Under Real Conditions of Care.

oversight_info.authority: France: Committee for the Protection of Personnes

brief_summary.textblock: Main Objective: The main objective of this retrospective observational study was to describe the evolution of visual acuity measured on ETDRS (Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study) scale, for patients with exudative Age-Related Macular Degeneration (ARMD), treated with Lucentis, under real conditions of care, in terms of mean change of the Best Corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA), measured at 24 months (± 4 weeks).

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective

primary_outcome.measure: Best Corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA), measured at 24 months (± 4 weeks).

secondary_outcome.measure: the mean change of the BCVA throughout the 24 months of follow-up (FU),

arm_group.description: Group of patients who received Lucentis ® with induction phase
Group of patients who received Lucentis ® without induction phase
group of patients who were monthly monitored (+/- 1 week)
group of patients with Follow up visits intervals> 1 month (+/- 1 week)
Group of patients who received Lucentis with induction phase and who were monthly monitored (+/- 1 week)
Group of patients selected in accordance with the date of Lucentis® treatment start.

intervention.description: intravitreal injections FOR ALL PATIENTS of Lucentis as required in the normal condition of use

study_pop.textblock: patients with exudative Age-Related Macular Degeneration (ARMD), treated with Lucentis, under real conditions of care
